verses.text: And the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w fell|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* by \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, unto the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* on the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, to the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* that goeth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* throughout \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*,\f + \fr 16.1 \ft fell: Heb. went forth\f*

And goeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* to \w Luz|strong="H3870"\w*, and passeth \w along|strong="H5674"\w* unto the \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Archi|strong="H0757"\w* to \w Ataroth|strong="H5852"\w*,

And goeth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w* to the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Japhleti|strong="H3311"\w*, unto the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w* the \w nether|strong="H8481"\w*, and to \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*: and the goings \w out|strong="H8444"\w* thereof are at the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.
So the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* and \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, took their \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w*.

Â¶ And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* was \add thus:\add* even the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* on the east \w side|strong="H4217"\w* was \w Ataroth-addar|strong="H5853"\w*, unto \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w* the \w upper|strong="H5945"\w*;

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* toward the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* to \w Michmethah|strong="H4366"\w* on the north \w side|strong="H6828"\w*; and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w* unto \w Taanath-shiloh|strong="H8387"\w*, and \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* by it on the \w east|strong="H4217"\w* to \w Janohah|strong="H3239"\w*;

And it went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w Janohah|strong="H3239"\w* to \w Ataroth|strong="H5852"\w*, and to \w Naarath|strong="H5292"\w*, and \w came|strong="H6293"\w* to \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* at \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

The \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w out|strong="H3212"\w* from \w Tappuah|strong="H8599"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w* unto the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kanah|strong="H7071"\w*; and the goings \w out|strong="H8444"\w* thereof were at the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*. This \add is\add* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

And the \w separate|strong="H3995"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \add were\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*.

And they drave not \w out|strong="H3423"\w* the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w*: but the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* the \w Ephraimites|strong="H0669"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* under \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w*.
